description:
This course is designed to give you insight into what Hypnosis can help resolve in medical issues, the root causes and give you examples of real life case studies.

This course is for you, if you are or know anyone who is suffering pain and are not able to manage it.

This course will help you gain insight into this alternative natural modality.

This course will explain the why and how disease attacks the human body.

This course will take just over an hour to complete.

This course has 11 Lectures

You will learn about the root causes for cancer, Irritable bowel syndrome, Headaches, Infertility, Depression/anxiety and OCD.

Pain management and how we control it, insomnia and importantly Transplant patients.

This course is based upon a Power Point presentation with my narration explaining the details.
title: What you need to know about Clinical Hypnotherapy Today!
